name: The 7th Int'l Conference on Sport Science and Physical Education
content: The 7th Int'l Conference on Sport Science and Physical Education (SSPE 2024) will be held during March 29-31, 2024 in Suzhou, China. This Conference will cover issues on Sport Science and Physical Educationï¼Œand other related topics. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods in related fields.
